title: Embedded Finance Is Fueling A $25 Billion ‘Banking As A Service’ (BaaS) Opportunity - Forbes
content: Embedded Finance Is Fueling A $25 Billion ‘Banking As A Service’ (BaaS) Opportunity  Forbes
description: Embedded finance is the “embedding” of banking software into a non-banking company’s operations. What makes it interesting is that it creates new revenue opportunities for both fintechs and banks.
